node.name: SN Toolbar
node.shortdescription:
This is very basic plugin, it is Eclipse HTML toolbar for source code editing.

It works as any other toolbar in HTML source editors - select part of text, and click on tag. There is no configuration.

2011-10-05
v 1.1.5 - More attribute variants for block tags. Preference page. BBCode is off by default.
2011-09-17
v 1.1.0 - New compact concept, new tags. BBCode added.
2011-09-12
v 1.0.2
2011-09-10
v 1.0.0
Install / update
http://www.specihost.com/eclipse/sn_toolbar/
  1. Inside Eclipse select Help -> Install New Software...
  2. Add a new site using the url above to the Eclipse Update Manager.
  3. Select SN Toolbar and click next, next...
  4. Reboot Eclipse and - enjoy clicking.

More info about installation and update.
node.body:
This is very basic plugin, it is Eclipse HTML toolbar for source code editing.

It works as any other toolbar in HTML source editors - select part of text, and click on tag. There is no configuration.

2011-10-05
v 1.1.5 - More attribute variants for block tags. Preference page. BBCode is off by default.
2011-09-17
v 1.1.0 - New compact concept, new tags. BBCode added.
2011-09-12
v 1.0.2
2011-09-10
v 1.0.0
Install / update
http://www.specihost.com/eclipse/sn_toolbar/
  1. Inside Eclipse select Help -> Install New Software...
  2. Add a new site using the url above to the Eclipse Update Manager.
  3. Select SN Toolbar and click next, next...
  4. Reboot Eclipse and - enjoy clicking.

More info about installation and update.
